# Directory introduction

This Directory contains data used in the single cell example.

cell_marker_db folder contains gmt file downloaded from https://www.gsea-msigdb.org/gsea/msigdb.

c8.all.v2023.1.Hs.symbols.gmt: The C8 gene set was downloaded from https://www.gsea-msigdb.org/gsea/msigdb.

filtered_gene_bc_matrices contains raw 10X output data obtained from https://cf.10xgenomics.com/samples/cell/pbmc3k/pbmc3k_filtered_gene_bc_matrices.tar.gz.

barcodes.tsv, genes.tsv, matrix.mtx: The single-cell transcriptomic data used in this study was derived from PBMC (Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cell) samples and can be obtained from the following source: https://cf.10xgenomics.com/samples/cell/pbmc3k/pbmc3k_filtered_gene_bc_matrices.tar.gz.

# Data link
```{r echo=FALSE}
library(fs)
x <- dir_info('examples/single_cell', recurse = TRUE,
  invert = TRUE, regexp = "[.]html$")[, 1:3] |>
    as.data.frame()
x_link <- gsub(x$path, pattern = "examples/single_cell/", replacement = "")
x$path <- sprintf("[%s](%s)", x_link, x_link)

knitr::kable(x, row.names = FALSE)
```
